DOC.detailed_description: The aim study measure effect moderate ( 5mg ) intensive ( 40mg ) lipid-lowering treatment rosuvastatin carotid intima-media thickness surrogate marker cardiovascular risk obtain whether CIMT correlate plaque component coronary artery evaluate Intravascular Ultrasound Virtual Histology ( IVUS-VH ) .
